ProjectTitle: Tricking tumor immunosuppression: RNA epigenetics as novel target to improve cancer immunotherapy
InitialFeedbackHistory:
06/07/2023
You submitted the RDM questions from your application, at this stage of your project FWO expects a more detailed DMP using the Flemish standard DMP template. When using DMPonline.be, make sure to complete the tab "FWO DMP (Flemish Standard DMP)" and check the corresponding box under phases to download. You can also find the template on the FWO website together with more information about the FWO research data management requirements: https://www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan/. Consult our website for more guidance on how to write a DMP: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance
label: good with suggestions
